description: Data frame analytics peak memory usage
title: analytics_memory_usage

job_id.description: Data Frame Analytics Job ID. Populated by Java.

peak_usage_bytes.description: Peak memory usage for the data frame analytics job in bytes

status.description: Describes how current memory usage relates to the configured memory limit. If the limit is exceeded, 'status' is 'hard-limit'.

increased_memory_estimate_bytes.description: If 'status' is set to 'hard-limit', this optional field provides the new advised memory limit.
